title: STAT+: In radiology, an early adopter of AI, technology is advancing faster than the field can keep up
description: AI use has exploded in radiology as the field struggles with staffing shortages, exacerbated by growing imaging volumes.
content: AI use has exploded in radiology as the field struggles with staffing shortages, exacerbated by growing imaging volumes.
